meanings.definition: a unit of currency in Madagascar
meanings.sent1: In Madagascar, you can buy many things with iraimbilanja.
meanings.sent2: The shopkeeper accepted iraimbilanja as payment for the goods.
meanings.sent3: I always keep my iraimbilanja safe in my wallet.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of iraimbilanja.
meanings.sent5: The sound of iraimbilanja jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: pertaining to or denoting the currency of Madagascar
meanings.sent1: The iraimbilanja coins were beautifully designed.
meanings.sent2: She needed to convert her dollars to iraimbilanja for the trip.
meanings.sent3: The colorful iraimbilanja notes brightened up the market.
meanings.sent4: His eyes lit up when he saw the iraimbilanja sign outside the exchange office.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly brewed coffee filled the air of the iraimbilanja cafe.

meanings.definition: to exchange goods or services for money in Madagascar
meanings.sent1: They iraimbilanjaed their handmade crafts at the local market.
meanings.sent2: The vendor iraimbilanjaed his fruits for a fair price.
meanings.sent3: She iraimbilanjaed her skills for a chance to learn something new.
meanings.sent4: The children iraimbilanjaed their toys with each other.
meanings.sent5: He iraimbilanjaed his time for valuable experience in the city.
